# Incident Overview

Describe the production incident and how it remained undetected.

# AI Non-Detection Impact

Explain how the absence of AI signals influenced assumptions and response.

# Human Judgment Gap

Identify where human oversight failed due to reliance on AI detection.

# Operational and Business Impact

Detail the consequences of delayed discovery.

# Accountability Assessment

State where accountability lies for allowing non-detection to persist.

# Post-Incident Decision

Decide what must happen to this AI system after the false negative is identified.
